title: Restore branding logo and emphasize 'PBR Projects' in homepage hero

requirements.summary: Ensure the PBR Projects logo reliably loads in header and footer with a correct production-safe asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays the logo image on all screen sizes (no broken image icon).
Footer displays the logo image (no broken image icon).
The logo file is present at `frontend/public/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png` (or the code is updated to match the actual shipped asset path) and loads via direct navigation to that URL.

file_operations.description: Add the required generated logo asset (Gold-and-charcoal "PBR Projects" logo mark on a white background) as a static public asset at this exact path and filename.

Add the production-served branding logo file at the exact path expected by the app. Ensure this file matches the intended shipped logo (e.g., copy/rename from `frontend/public/assets/generated/pbr-projects-logo.dim_800x800.png`) so `/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png` resolves in production builds.
Create a small helper that builds asset URLs using the app base path (e.g., via `import.meta.env.BASE_URL`) to make logo references robust in production deployments.
Update the header logo `img` to use the shared base-aware asset helper for `/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png`, ensuring it renders reliably across environments.
Update the footer logo `img` to use the shared base-aware asset helper for `/assets/brand/pbr-projects-logo.png`, ensuring it renders reliably across environments.

requirements.summary: Make the homepage hero headline prominently display "PBR Projects" as the largest text while keeping an English tagline below.
acceptanceCriteria: In the hero section, the largest headline text includes exactly "PBR Projects" and is visually dominant (larger than surrounding text) on mobile and desktop.
The hero section remains responsive and does not overflow or clip the headline on common breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Replace the hero headline content so the largest text includes exactly "PBR Projects" and move the supporting tagline to the text below, keeping the section responsive (adjust Tailwind typography/line wrapping as needed to avoid overflow/clipping).
